name: Bestrafe Mich
wikiSummary: "Bestrafe mich" ("Punish me"), is the fourth track on the album Sehnsucht by Rammstein. It uses S&M imagery and wordplay to describe the relationship between man and God.
wikiText:
"Bestrafe mich" ("Punish me"), is the fourth track on the album Sehnsucht by Rammstein. It uses S&M imagery and wordplay to describe the relationship between man and God.
